title: Bucksin6ixffsn
desc: A website for the Bucksin6ixffsn podcast, written in React with backend admin authentication using an Express server
more info: For users this is a simple website to display info about the podcast and allow users to submit comments under each podcast, as well as general comments about the podcast as a whole. However, it also conatins a hidden admin sign-in, allowing the podcast creators to update the site with new podcasts, images for each podcast, and profile pictures.
prompt: The code is not public for security reasons, but you can view this site

title: Digital Sampler
desc: A music production application that allows users to play around with audio effects
more info: This software provides a variety of music samples, and gives users the options to apply reverb, distortion, delay, and chorus to said audio effects. The user can also bind each sample to a key on the keyboard and activate the sample by pressing the key. In short, this allows users to essentially play music using just their keyboard! There is also a feature to upload your own samples and add them to a public database. Below is a short demonstration of some of the functionality.

title: ChatTrip
desc: An AI-powered travel agent that has full chatting capabilities
more info: This AI-powered chatbot utilizes an ExpressJS server endpoint to make calls to the OpenAI API. Paired with a clean interface written in NextJS and TailwindCSS, this application gives an amazing user-experience that could revolutionize the travel industry.

title: Image Classifier
desc: A PyTorch-based neural network to classify a dataset of 60,000 clothing images, achieving an 86% prediction accuracy
